member.name: IAMStreamConfig.GetFormat

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The GetFormat method retrieves the current or preferred output format.

member.param: Address of a pointer to an structure.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Possible values include the following.

listheader.description: The input pin is not connected.

member.name: IAMStreamConfig.GetNumberOfCapabilities

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The GetNumberOfCapabilities method retrieves the number of format capabilities that this pin supports.

member.param: Pointer to a variable that receives the number of format capabilities.
Pointer to a variable that receives the size of the configuration structure in bytes. See Remarks for more information.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Possible values include the following.

listheader.description: The input pin is not connected.

member.name: IAMStreamConfig.SetFormat

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The SetFormat method sets the output format on the pin.

member.param: Pointer to an structure that specifies the new format.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Possible values include the following.

listheader.description: This media type is not valid.
The input pin is not connected.
Cannot set the type; the filter is not stopped.
Cannot set the type; the filter is not stopped.

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]

The IAMStreamConfig interface sets the output format on certain capture and compression filters, for both audio and video. Applications can use this interface to set format properties, such as the output dimensions and frame rate (for video) or the sample rate and number of channels (for audio).
